attributes.action: Increase Mr Rassells pay to make him not leave
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Rassell is leaving Taverham High School, this is schocking news as he was almost everyone he taughts favourite teacher, if he leaves then it will be a great shame for everyone. So I wish to stop him by creating this petition

rejection.details: Petitions to the Number 10 site must request an action that can be taken by the Prime Minister or Government, as explained in the terms and conditions: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
